sentences.en: A yeoman farmer model of price setting under monopolistic competition.
sentences.cn: 垄断竞争中自耕农定价模式.

sentences.en: Her uncle spend two years on a warship as a yeoman.
sentences.cn: 她舅舅在军舰上当了两年文书军士.

sentences.en: The medicine you gave me has done me Yeoman's service.
The yeoman could never own and work on their land after the movement.
sentences.cn: 那场运动后,自耕农再也不能拥有并在他们自己的土地上耕耘了.

sentences.en: The yeoman never own and work on their land after the movement.
sentences.cn: 再也不能拥有并在他们自己的土地上耕耘了.

sentences.en: Visitors to the Tower of London talk to a Yeoman Warder, left, on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 一群参观伦敦塔的游客周二和伦敦塔守卫(左)交谈.

words.tran_cn: 自由民；自耕农；（英）义勇骑兵队

trans.tran_cn: <史>自耕农，自由民，义勇骑兵队成员
trans.tran_en: a farmer in Britain in the past who owned and worked on his own land
